name: Passenger (michim, manum)
description:
So you've played [insert hard rally game here], are you up for the next challenge? Give up control and become the worlds greatest co-driver.

Experience procedurally generated tracks, breath taking action and beautiful graphics (subjective).

Help to beat your opponent by giving the driver the right instructions on what kind of turn is coming up ahead. To do so, click the yellow arrows on the map on your clipboard.

Once you make it to the end of a track, a new one is generated for you to drive.
